Item List.customDescription: A headdress made out of the scraped out head of a wolf.
A Fog machine which runs on low grade fuel. Can be set to fill an area with a dense fog or triggered by motion.
A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.
An improvised wooden kayak. Seats two and requires a Paddle to operate.
Lighter, faster arrow that deals less damage.
An arrow for a Hunting Bow and Crossbow.
An Arrow equipped with a large bone arrowhead making it very easy to hit targets at the expense of damage
A fuel soaked arrow, ignite it by aiming.
Shoddy ammo with multiple projectiles.
Standard nailgun ammunition
Ammunition for a Pistol. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.
Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.
This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.
Ammunition for a Rifle. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.
This ammo explodes on contact dealing a small amount of fragmentation damage to nearby objects.
Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.
This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.
Ammunition for a Rocket Launcher. A short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact.
Creates flames upon impact.
Fast moving rocket ammunition. Short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact but less damage than a normal rocket.
Ammunition for a Shotgun.
Incendiary Shotgun Ammunition
Single large projectile for a Shotgun.
Ammunition for a speargun.
A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead in a straight line.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.

A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.

A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.
A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.
A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.
A high wooden wall used to keep people off your property.
A prison cell gate to lock things behind bars
A prison cell wall.
A Chainlink Fence Gate.
A Chainlink Fence.
A garage door that rolls up and down.
Netting you can climb.
A shop front to do commerce.
A bulletproof shop front for secure trades.
Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window.
Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.
Window bars made out of wood. They'll stop people climbing through your window, but probably not for very long.
Static shutter that forms a metal horizontal embrasure over your window frame.
Static shutter that forms a metal vertical embrasure over your window frame.
Bulletproof glass insert
Wood shutters that you can open and close.
A high wooden watchtower with a ladder
Thank you for playing the game through its early access run. Enjoy these boots made from radiation resistant frog rubber.
Basic burlap gloves, offering protection from the elements
Gloves made out of leather, offers a small amount of protection to the upper body.
Gloves made out of metal offers a good amount of protection to the upper body.
A Halterneck made from the hide of an animal.
A wooly hat.
A boonie hat.
A Bucket Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.
A Headwrap made out of burlap.
A hat with a candle on top. You can turn the candle on in your inventory.
A baseball cap.
A special item for those who own Clatter.
A Coffee Can Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.
A helmet made of bone.
Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced vision and movement speed.
A leather cap with a flashlight attached. It uses Low Grade Fuel and can be activated from the inventory.
A makeshift riot Helmet. Great at deflecting melee attacks.
A shoddy helmet made from Wood and Cloth.
A hoodie.
A suit of armor made of bones.
Offers superior protection at the cost of aiming down sights and reduced movement speed.
A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.
A rugged jacket.
A shoddy piece of body armor made from Wood and rope.
A home made balaclava.
A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.
A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.
Enables vision at nighttime by projecting and amplifying infrared light.The batteries can be recharged at a Lvl 2 workbench. Cannot be worn with a helmet.
BaboAbe Ninja Suit
Trousers made out of burlap.
Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced movement speed.
Trousers made from the hide of an animal.
A shoddy piece of leg armor made from roadsigns.
Trousers without the bottom of the legs.
A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Wood and rope.
Pants.
A Poncho made from the hide of an animal.
A Shirt made out of burlap.
A smart casual shirt
A Vest made from the hide of an animal.
A tshirt without sleeves
Work boots.
Shoes made out of burlap.
Boots made from the hide of an animal.
A Skirt made from the hide of an animal.
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
A t-shirt with long sleeves.
A t-shirt with very short sleeves.
A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.
A shoddy piece of body armor made from roadsigns.
A low quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A medium quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A high quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A low quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
A medium quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
A high quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
Low quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
High quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
A selection of gears. Some functional, some not.
A Metal Blade for making melee weapons.
Metal Pipe.
Strong metal object.
Some road signs made of metal.
A Sewing kit. Used to make advanced clothing.
A metal spring. Used to provide motion or resistance in objects.
A barricade made out of Stones.
Perfect for cover when engaging in gun fights. Decays rapidly when placed outside of building privilege.
A tough metal barricade with barbed wire, made from Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.
A protective barricade made out of Sand Bags.
A protective barricade made out of Stones.
A wooden barricade. Will hurt players and animals that run into it.
A wooden barricade with barbed wire, made of Wood and Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.
A makeshift Barbeque. You can cook significant amounts of food with this.
A metal trap that can injure or even kill people when stepped on. Can be picked up after been triggered.
A Bed. Placing this will give you a place to respawn and can be used much more frequently than a sleeping bag. Note: Must be placed inside a building.
A small camp fire. Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.
A small ceiling mounted light source.
Every home needs a chair. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated.
Produces fertilizer from compostable items.
A Computer station for remote control access
This item can be deployed on walls so that players can input items from the exterior of the building for safe keeping. You can only access the submitted contents of the Drop Box from the rear.
A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.
A stone fireplace to heat your home. Must be placed indoors and against a wall.
A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst
A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts
A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst
A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst
A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts
A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst
A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air
Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks
Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks
Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks
A set of spikes that will slow down and hurt anyone that walks over them.
A fridge you can store food into!
Used to smelt large quantities of ore. Difficult to secure, must be placed on terrain.
A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.
A Hitching post and Trough. Dismounting your horses here will keep them healthy and fed as long as it is kept stocked with food.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
An old military Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light, requires low grade fuel to work.
Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 30 items.
A storage container for water. Can output 10ml of water a second via a hose.
A locker for keeping your clothes and armor safe!
A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.
Used for mixing recipes.
This allows you to modify modular vehicles
A small refinery which can produce Low Grade Fuel from Crude Oil.
A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.
A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.
A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered
Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.
A smart electric switch.
The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard and Large Storage Box to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.
A Large Rechargeable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A simple electric button.
A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.
A Heartbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a 10m radius
A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam
A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it
A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it recieves power
Provides warmth in a radius when on
Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.
Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.
A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.
A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source
This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.
This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output. Can be wired in series, can not be used with any non energy producing electrical components.

A 1 bit storage component. SET input will set the value to 1 CLEAR input sets the value to 0. Output will provide connected power if value is 1, Inverted output will provide connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop
A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source
This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the SET input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough
An RF Broadcaster
An RF Receiver

An exclusive-or logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. if BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.
A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.
A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.
Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received
A flashing blue light
A spinning siren light
A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.
A simple electric switch.
Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.
A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.
An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.
A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.
Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.
A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.
You can repair your items here for a fraction of their construction cost. You may also use this to apply new skins to existing items.
You can use this table to learn how to permanently craft items you have found in exchange for scrap.
A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.
A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.
A Large, wide beam, aimable light source.
A luxurious, comfortable chair for long sessions of CCTV watching.
Shelves for item stacking
A large banner hanging on a wall.
A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.
A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.
A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A tall canvas for artists paintings.
An extra large canvas for artists paintings.
A double extra large canvas for artists paintings.
A large banner hanging on a pole.
A double sign post that you can plant into terrain.
A single sign post that you can plant into terrain.
A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain.
A double sided town sign post, with roof, that you can plant into terrain.
A 6-meter by 3-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A 3-meter by 1.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A shotgun trap triggered by movement, place near doorways and load with handmade shells.
A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.
A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.
A comfortable old sofa. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.
A comfortable old sofa with a floral pattern. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.
An interactive spinning wheel.
Traps fish, place on the shore and load with bait. The more bait loaded the bigger the chance of catching Trout.
Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 1
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 2
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 3
Placing and authorising with the cupboard will make it so only you can build in a 50 meter radius of it. If you want your friends to build, they'll need to auth too. You should protect this.
A Makeshift wall light.

Trade your goods with other players safely by creating sell and buy orders.  

If a raider gains access to the rear panel, they will have free reign over all of your goodies. Keep it safe.
Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
A Water Purifier. Place overtop of a campfire. Will provide clean, drinkable water from salty, or stagnant water.
Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.
Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 12 items.
A canteen used to carry Water. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.
Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.
A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.
An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.
A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.
A classic acoustic guitar, built for jam sessions around campfires at night.
Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.
The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.
A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.
Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.
A collection of used piping thats been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.
A selection of bones that were acquired for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.

Place on a door to avoid any unwelcome guests. To craft your key first place the lock on a door and hold E while looking at the Key lock and select 'Create Key', a key will now be added to your crafting queue.

If the key is lost, you cannot make another, so don't forget to make extras and put them in a safe place!
An electronic lock. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.
A decorative Paper lantern
A heavy brass door knocker
A special dragon mask to celebrate Chinese New Year
Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!
An Ox mask to celebrate the 2021 Lunar New Year.
A Beautifully crafted bronze and gold Rat mask to celebrate the 2020 Lunar New Year
A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.
A special tiger mask to celebrate Chinese New Year
An Arcade Machine
A silly Bunny Hat with wobbly ears to celebrate Easter 2021
A beautiful, hand crafted Easter themed door wreath.
An exquisite hand crafted gold and diamond egg. When opened, a very special melody can be heard as you observe an intricate representation of your favorite monument.
A beautiful hand crafted white gold and sapphire encrusted egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted purple egg with gold lace, a miniature offshore monument is contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted Ivory and gold egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted gold and green egg, with a miniature traincart contained inside.
An extremely silly easter nest hat with googly eyes.
Large Candles
Small Candles

A pumpkin that you can carve. 

Requires wood as a fuel source.
A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.
A Spooky Fence
Get into the halloween spirit with this decorate deployable item.
A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.
A spooky skull door knocker
Enjoy burning your enemies remnants to ashes with this Halloween exclusive! Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.
Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!
A Surgeon Suit
A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
A magnificent moustache for Movember
A scrap of paper for leaving notes.
A small green light source.
A small light source.
A small red light source.
A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.
The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.
A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.
A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.
A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.
Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.
An inflated tube for aquatic activities.
An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload.
A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.
A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A large frame for your photos.
A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A large water gun with pumpable pressure. Hold reload to pump!
A small water gun that doesn't require pumping, but has a lower range and output.
Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
Every gamer needs a headset! - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
A vagabond staple. Use this repurposed oil barrel to stay warm.
A string of colored lights to decorate your home
A Festive decoration to spruce up your  doorway during the holdiays!
A Festive decoration to spruce up your double doorway during the holidays!
Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane
Get into the holiday spirit with these decorative giant lollipops
A small neon sign!
An animated neon sign!
A medium neon sign!
A large, animated neon sign!
A large neon sign!
Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 electricity. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.
A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.
Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative snowman
A santa beard. Ho Ho ho.
A snowman helmet which provides ample protection.
A Festive decoration to spruce up your windows during the holdiays!
Get into the christmas spirit with this holiday door wreath.

This automated electric sentry turret will engage and neutralize any moving targets it has line of sight to. You must equip it with a projectile weapon and the corresponding ammunition. Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it. Requires 10 power.
Automated Flame turret. Requires Low Grade Fuel. Sprays flames when triggered.
Ammunition for a Sam Site, This missile contains a rudimentary guidance system to help it navigate through strong winds.
A component used for crafting C4 and Rockets.
Made from Sulfur and Charcoal, a key ingredient of anything that goes bang!
Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources.
Binoculars allowing you to see objects at great length.
C4, useful for breaking into bases.
A hand held RF signal broadcaster. Left click to broadcast. Configurable with right mouse.
Use [attack2] to cast out the line and wait for a bite. Requires bait.
Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!
A powerful flashlight which illuminates your surroundings and can be used as a weapon.
A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.
A large medkit.
Heal yourself or others with this syringe. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.
An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.
A building plan. You can use this to craft buildings - right click when equipped for more options.
Produces a large cloud of opaque greyish white smoke.
Use the Spray Can to reskin your items. Press [attack2] while looking at an item to open the skin picker.
Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.

A tool used to make connections between electrical objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle. you can then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.
Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.
Single module large engine.
Single module flatbed.
Single module armored seating for two passengers.
Single module seating for two passengers.
Single module storage.
Single module seating for two passengers, with protection at the front.
Dual module camper that allows up to 4 players to respawn. Also includes a barbecue, a locker and a small box for item storage.
Dual module large flatbed.
Dual module large fuel tank.
Dual module seating.
A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.
A portable Boom Box that can play tapes and internet audio streams. [attack] to start/stop and [attack2] to modify settings.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.
Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.
Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.
A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.
A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.
A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.
A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.
A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+reload] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.
A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialler.
A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.
Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!
Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a beam of light. Pressing F (default) to toggle light.
Uses laser projection to create a holographic sight which is always pointing at the target regardless of view angle.
Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a guiding laser and reduces weapon sway.
Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet velocity and accuracy.
Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable and dealing slightly less damage to your foes.
A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.
Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.
A small 8x zoom scope.
High damage machine rifle.
Ice-covered high damage machine rifle.
Heal yourself or others with this bandage. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.
Unreliable explosive device.
A High powered, highly accurate, long range rifle.
A blunt weapon made from a femur. All around basic gathering tool.
Melee weapon crafted from bone fragments. Good for harvesting carcases.
Hunting Bow, useful for short to medium range combat and hunting.
A Chainsaw. Very effective at cutting trees in addition to soft fleshy objects. Requires Low Grade Fuel to run.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.
A very powerful bow. Can only be fully drawn while stationary. Keep still for bonus damage and speed.
A very accurate ranged weapon.
A Shotgun with two barrels allowing two shots to be fired in quick succession before needing to reload.
A very cheap, very ineffective, and very unreliable pistol that fires shells.
Reliable explosive device.
A Flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition.
A Hammer, used to upgrade building materials. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
A Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.
Combat knife designed for close combat engagements, can attack while sprinting. Best in class at harvesting flesh.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon, It's unique design makes it easier to hit your target when compared to other more traditional weapons.
A brutal weapon with good range.
A medium damage machine gun.
A construction tool turned deadly
A versatile melee weapon that can also be used to paddle a kayak.
A Pickaxe, useful for gathering ore from rocks.
A Shotgun. Fires a single round before reloading.
A High Powered six-shooter.
A standard eight shot revolver.
A Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.
Shoots rockets slightly farther than North Korea.
A high-yield resource gathering axe. Slower than the Hatchet.
A Hammer made from a bunch of other crap.
A high-yield resource gathering Icepick.
Small explosive package constructed of beancan grenades. Useful for destroying wood and sheet metal doors.
A Shotgun. Fires six rounds.
A semi-automatic pistol, fires rapidly and with good accuracy.
A Semi Automatic Rifle.
A rapid-firing Machine Gun. Sacrifices accuracy and distance for speed.
A speargun which can only be fired underwater. Excellent for hunting Sharks.
Primitive tool used for harvesting wood from trees and logs.
Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.
A stone-tipped wooden Spear. Slightly longer range.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.
A powerful melee weapon made from a filed-down wrench. Great durability, good damage.
A medium damage machine gun.
Celebrating 15 Years of Garry's Mod! Use this tool gun to upgrade building parts. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.
A bucket for transporting water or other liquids.
Primitive weapon, perfect for hunting your foes. Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.
A set of roadsign armor for a horse
A set of wooden horse armor
Equipping this saddle bag will add extra storage space on your horse
Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

A black berry.
A clipping of a Black Berry Plant.

These black berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.
A blue berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A Clipping of a Corn Plant.

Corn seeds can be found when picking wild Corn plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.
A clipping of a hemp plant.

Hemp seeds can be found when picking wild Hemp. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more cloth and faster groth.

A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

These potato seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.
An edible vegetable that can also be worn as a hat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A Clipping of a pumpkin plant.

Pumpkin Seeds can be found when picking wild Pumpkin plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Pumpkins and faster groth.

Used in creation of medkits.
Extracted from animal carcass.  Used as a raw material to make bone weapons and armour.

Paper, a ingredient for Building plan and Note.

Use this item in a Research Bench to create blueprints of items.
Water with a high salt content. Consuming will damage your health.
Scrap can be used in a Research table and Workbench to unlock and research items. Often used as a currency throughout the world.
Harvested from rocks using tools, basic building material.
A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.

Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.
A computer loaded with software that can analyze a video and produce rotational deltas to individual objects contained in the feed.
Water. Drinking it will alleviate your thirst.
